WeaponTraitDef.label: conclusive
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona has better things to be doing than being used to wave at things and thus seeks to end fights quickly. While held, it provides its wielder with an increased chance to hit their target.

WeaponTraitDef.label: squemish
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona really doesn't like touching the soft warm insides of things. While held, it provides its wielder with a decreased chance to hit their target.

WeaponTraitDef.label: non-newtonian
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona subtly modifies the atoms near the wielder's skin increasing their attenuation to knetic energy before impact. While held, it provides its wielder with increased armor rating.

WeaponTraitDef.label: bond sundering
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona weakens the natural forces binding molecular structures together around its weilder. While held, it provides its wielder with reduced armor rating.
